Description:
Required Skills to be successful:Minimum 10 years’ experience in auto or similar industry
Experience with forecast, and actuals environment, and profit modelling
Professional certified (CMA, CPA ..)
Good communication skills & confident.About the Team:In this position you will be working in a fast paced and diverse environment. You will be reporting directly to the GM Auto Finance Transformation & COEWhat equips you for the role:Proactive Finance partner with strong entrepreneurial and commercial focus – engage with operational partners to provide commercial insight and shape business proposals. Includes navigation of required approval steps. 
Ideally finance qualification. Relevant commercial qualification would be considered. 
Professional Accounting qualification an advantage but not mandatory. 
Demonstrated experience with balance sheet, income statement, cashflow, and capital budgeting. 
Modelling experience, applied in new business, forecast, and actuals environment. 
Minimum approx. 10 years experience in auto or similar industry.
Comfortable with ambiguity and difficult timelines
Excellent communication skills – must be able to relate effectively across all levels and areas of organization. Communicates clearly and directly while remaining diplomatic. 
Excellent analytical skills – distil complex problems to critical messages, and communicate effectively to a non-technical audience. 
Confident self-starter with delivery focus and strong work ethic. Job Details
